summary: Kenneth is a socially awkward office worker who has little experience with romance. He buys a life-like sex doll in an attempt to rid him of his loneliness, but soon finds there may be a dark side to 'Nikki'.
cast: Desmond Harrington|Melissa Sagemiller|Udo Kier|Rip Torn|Robert Bagnell|Brad William Henke|John Cassini|Camille Guaty|Michael Peña|Edie Mirman|Lyle Kanouse|Ellen Greene|Opal Anchel|John Joseph Burns|Bryan Crump
title: Love Object
